post.author: 이진경
post.content:
BEFORE YOU APPLY, PLEASE READ!:
1) We're happy to read a cover letter, but be advised that our end-client would ONLY see your resume. So it's essential that the specific skills requested be clearly demonstrated in the resume.
2) You must be able to start work on a maximum of 2 weeks' notice.

Responsibilities:
Analysis, design and development with Mark IV at large insurance firm.

Mandatory skills:
(PLEASE DO NOT WASTE OUR TIME OR YOURS BY RESPONDING TO THIS POSTING UNLESS YOU HAVE THE MANDATORY SKILL(S) - we will not deal with candidates who don뭪 follow instructions.)

1. Strong Mark IV programming language skills. Working experience must be fairly recent; within the last 2-3 years max.
2. Minimum of 2 years' post-graduate working experience.

Assets:
1. Umbrella software experience


Additional Information
Salary: CAD 50,000.00 to CAD 60,000.00 per year
Position Type: Full Time, Permanent
Ref Code: 6SE-9-MW  

Contact Information
Marcia Walter
marcia@gsigroup.com
GSI International Consulting Group
ON
post.title: Mark IV Programmer Analyst
